categories.name: Special endorsement
categories.description: The nominating State or Territory government agency has determined that your proposed business is of unique and important benefit to the State or Territory where the nominating government agency is located

categories.name: Financial assets
categories.description: Net business and personal assets of you, your partner or you and your partner combined in each of the preceding 2 fiscal years of at least:

categories.name: Business turnover
categories.description: You had an ownership interest in one or more main businesses that had an annual turnover in at least 2 of the 4 fiscal years immediately before the time of invitation to apply for the visa

categories.name: Business Innovation stream only - Business experience
categories.description: You have held one or more main businesses before you were invited to apply for the visa for

options.label: Not less than 4 years within the preceding 5 years
Not less than 7 years within the preceding 8 years

categories.name: Investor stream only - Investor experience
categories.description: Immediately before the time of application you held eligible investments of at least AUD250,000 held for

options.label: Not less than 4 years before the invitation time
Not less than 7 years before the invitation time

categories.name: Business innovation qualifications
categories.description: Select your business qualifications

options.label: Patents or designs registered not less than 1 year before that time and used in the day to day activities of the main business
Trademarks registered not less than 1 year before that time and used in the day to day activities of the main business
Ownership and day to day participation in a main business operated under a formal joint venture agreement entered into no less than 1 year before the time
Ownership interest in a main business that derives no less than 50% of its annual turnover from export trade
Ownership in a main business with average annualised growth in turnover greater than 20% per annum over 3 continuous fiscal years and employing 10+ FTE in at least one of those years
Ownership in a main business that received a government grant of at least AUD10,000 for early phase startup, product commercialisation, business development or expansion
Ownership in a main business that received venture capital funding of at least AUD100,000 not more than 4 years before the time of invitation for startup/commercialisation/development/expansion

categories.name: Age
categories.description: Which age band do you fit into?

categories.name: English language requirements
categories.description: How would you rate your English language ability?

categories.name: Educational Qualifications
categories.description: What is your highest qualification?

options.label: Trade certificate, diploma or bachelor degree by an Australian education institute; or a bachelor qualification recognised by an educational institution of a recognised standard
Bachelor degree in business, science or technology by an Australian institution; or a bachelor qualification in business, science or technology by a recognised institution

visas.name: Skilled Independent Visa (Subclass 189) Permanent visa for skilled workers without sponsorship.

categories.name: Age
categories.description: Which age band do you fit into?

options.label: at least 18 but less than 25 years
at least 25 but less than 33 years
at least 33 but less than 40 years
at least 40 but less than 45 years

categories.name: English language requirements
categories.description: How would you rate your English language ability?

categories.name: Skilled employment outside Australia
categories.description: Skilled employment outside Australia

options.label: At least 3 but less than 5 years
At least 5 but less than 8 years

categories.name: Australian skilled employment
categories.description: Skilled employment in Australia

options.label: At least 1 but less than 3 years
At least 3 but less than 5 years
At least 5 but less than 8 years

categories.name: Educational qualifications
categories.description: What is your highest educational qualification?

options.label: A Doctorate from an Australian educational institution or a Doctorate from another educational institution, that is of a recognised standard.
At least a Bachelor degree from an Australian educational institution or at least a Bachelor qualification, from another educational institution, that is of a recognised standard.
A diploma or trade qualification from an Australian educational institution.
Attained a qualification or award recognised by the relevant assessing authority for your nominated skilled occupation as being suitable for that occupation.

categories.name: Specialist education qualification
categories.description: Do you have a Masters degree by research or a Doctorate degree from an Australian educational institution that included at least 2 academic years study in a relevant field?

categories.name: Australian study requirement
categories.description: Do you have at least 1 degree, diploma or trade qualification from an Australian educational institution that meets the Australian study requirement?

categories.name: Professional Year in Australia
categories.description: Did you complete a professional year in Australia?

categories.name: Credentialed community language
categories.description: Have you been accredited at the paraprofessional level or above, certified at the certified provisional level or above, or have a community language credential for interpreting or translating by NAATI?

categories.name: Study in regional Australia
categories.description: Do you have at least 1 degree, diploma or trade qualification from an Australian educational institution that satisfies the Australian study requirement obtained while living and studying in an eligible area of regional Australia?

categories.name: Partner skills
categories.description: Select the relevant partner skills qualifications

options.label: Your spouse or de facto partner is also an applicant for this visa and meets age, English and skill criteria.
Your spouse or de facto partner is also an applicant for this visa and has competent English.
You are single or your partner is an Australian citizen or permanent resident.
